docs.text: this will create the following entry in package.json ace-design-system": "1.X.X mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. npm install ace-design-system --save npm install ace-design-system --save Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Components

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Installation For full documentation visit the official github repo . Mac: If you are on a mac run all the following commands in the terminal Windows: If you are on a windows machine, run all the following commands in the Node.js terminal. If you do not have the node terminal install, please see to install npm/node Navigate to the root directory of your project cd project-root Install the Ace Design Library npm install ace-design-system --save this will create an entry in package.json for ace-design-system": "1.X.X In your react js files, import the ace-design-system package and associative components Dependency Issues Be sure to verify that you hav all of the appropriate depedencies installed to support the libray. Alerts will appear in your terminal on install.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Navigate to the root directory of your project cd project-root Install the Ace Design Library npm install ace-design-system --save this will create an entry in package.json for ace-design-system": "1.X.X In your react js files, import the ace-design-system package and associative components Dependency Issues Be sure to verify that you hav all of the appropriate depedencies installed to support the libray. Alerts will appear in your terminal on install.

docs.text: Button The API documentation of the Button React component. Demos Idle Active Inactive Props Name Type Default Description active string Used to update button state. If active is set to false, onClick prop will be disabled. label string button Display on button component [passed to ButtonLabel child component as label prop]. onClick function Function called when button is clicked. Any other properties supplied will be spread to the root element (native element). CSS API
docs.title: Button

docs.text: Input The API documentation of the Input React component. Demos Input Field Props Name Type Default Description name string Name attribute assigned to the root input element. callback function Optional callback function to be called onChange. Passes input state as argument. label string button Display on input component [passed to InputLabelMUI child component]. type string text Type attribute assigned to the root input element. Property to define the expected input for the field [dictates keyboard recognition on native platforms]. Any other properties supplied will be spread to the root element (native element). CSS API
